summary: Successfully expanded the fullscreen card slider from 2 slides to 5 slides. Added 3 new slides focusing on premium quality construction, strategic prime locations, and investment opportunities. Each slide has unique content, high-quality images, and maintains the same elegant design and functionality.
current_status: FullscreenCardSlider now features 5 comprehensive slides showcasing different aspects of the real estate development business, providing a more complete presentation of services and value propositions.
